title: Ensure layouts work on very small screens
message:
Ensure layouts work on very small screens

Very small screen sizes are common when using multi-window mode on phones. This ensures all the content is reachable in those constrained layout sizes.

title: Use ParcelFileDescriptor.parseMode() to open documents with the correct mode
message:
Use ParcelFileDescriptor.parseMode() to open documents with the correct mode

Instead of parsing the mode manually, use ParcelFileDescription.parseMode() to extract the appropriate mode for us

title: Move DocumentProvider AUTHORITY to build.gradle file
message:
Move DocumentProvider AUTHORITY to build.gradle file

The DocumentProvider's AUTHORITY must match between the AndroidManifest.xml and code. By centralizing it into the build.gradle file, these will not fall out of sync with one another and different build variants can customize it to allow side by side installations.

title: Replace no longer supported splitActionBarWhenNarrow with custom split action bar.
message:
Replace no longer supported splitActionBarWhenNarrow with custom split action bar.

As the 'split action bar' only contains a single large button 'Donate', it was easy to create that as a separate button that is added only on <480dp screen - on >=480dp screens, it shows as a menu item in the action bar as always.

title: Ensure KEYSTORE environment variable exists before attempting to read it as the keystore file
message:
Ensure KEYSTORE environment variable exists before attempting to read it as the keystore file

This allows other developers to checkout the project and build it successfully even if they do not have the KEYSTORE set up properly to build a release build (something they wouldn't do anyways).
